title: I feel Shaco is very weak and doesn't impact the result of the game enough. Regardless of good he is
body:
I've almost never lost against an enemy shaco, and rarely every win with an ally shaco

Regardless of how much they gank, how hard they counterjungle or just kill during the first 20ish minutes. once teamfights kick in, they just can't seem to do much

I've teamfought against a 8/0 shaco and a relatively strong enemy team but we won regardless because of how non-impactful shaco was during that teamfight.
And his splitpushing wasn't great either
